edu.cmu.sphinx.instrumentation
Class BeamFinder

java.lang.Object
  edu.cmu.sphinx.instrumentation.BeamFinder
All Implemented Interfaces:
Configurable, java.util.EventListener, Resetable, ResultListener, StateListener
public class BeamFinder
extends java.lang.Object
implements Configurable, ResultListener, Resetable, StateListener

Monitors the absolute and relative beam sizes required to achieve the optimum recognition results and reports this data.
